name: Visual Basic Project File
summary: Learn about .VBP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VBP files are used with the older Visual Basic development software, which has now been replaced by Visual Basic.NET. VB.NET now uses .VBPROJ files to store projects.
NOTE: Visual Studio 2010 no longer supports the conversion of VBP projects into the newer Visual Basic.NET project format. You need an earlier version of Visual Studio for conversion.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
